title: Fix warning_alerts threshold evaluation for inactivity/stage aging/missing next steps

sections.text: Resolve incorrect or inconsistent triggering of threshold-based warning_alerts by standardizing how inactivity days, stage aging, and missing-next-step conditions are computed from CRM data. Ensure calculations use a single time basis (timezone/now), handle null/missing fields safely, and do not double-count due to sync delays or partial updates. Add unit tests covering edge cases (no activity history, stage change today, next-step cleared) to prevent regressions.
